verses.name: Romans 5:11
verses.text: And not only so, but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom we have now received the atonement.

verses.name: Romans 5:12
verses.text: Wherefore, as by one man sin entered into the world, and death by sin; and so death passed upon all men, for that all have sinned:

verses.name: Romans 5:13
verses.text: (For until the law sin was in the world: but sin is not imputed when there is no law.

verses.name: Romans 5:14
verses.text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses, even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam’s transgression, who is the figure of him that was to come.
